<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# Or Node Formatting

Represents `foo || bar` (or `foo or bar`) statement.

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
"foo" || false
```

After:

```ruby
"foo" || false
```

## Formats recursively

Before:

```ruby
(true && false) || ("foo" || false) || default_value
```

After:

```ruby
(true && false) || ("foo" || false) || default_value
```
